1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Mustawarid bin Shaddad said:"I saw the Messenger of Allah performing ablution, and he ran his little finger between his toes." (Sahih) Another chain with similar wording

chapter.eng-name: Running the fingers of one hand between the finger of the other (and the toes)
